vendor_name: Waldorf Astoria Monarch Beach Resort & Club
title: Five-Star Oceanfront California Resort with Private Beach Club, US$100 Spa Credit & US$200 Dining Credit
description: Find yourself in unparalleled luxury at the five-star Waldorf Astoria Monarch Beach Resort & Club, a prestigious haven nestled on the sun-kissed coast of Dana Point, California. This exquisite resort blends indulgence and inspiration, with a private beach club, three sparkling pools and a perfectly manicured golf course. Savour world-class dining at the resort's seven unique restaurants and lounges, ranging from the casual oceanview meals at AVEO Table + Bar, to the prestigious Bourbon Steak by Michael Mina. Venture beyond the resort to explore the vibrant Laguna Beach art scene, or embark on a whale-watching adventure at Dana Point Harbour.
location_description: Waldorf Astoria Monarch Beach Resort & Club
offer_address: 1 Monarch Beach Resort, Dana Point, California 92629, USA
